Server.Name: War Of the Walkers SDX
Server.Description:
War of the Walkers SDX Version
A highly experimental version of War of the Walkers (Release September 23rd, 2017), combined tastefully with SDX Mods.
Enhancements include: -> Bigger Back Pack ( 42 Slot ) -> Crafting Lag Fixes -> Expanded Minibike Storage w/ built-in Combine Workstation -> Guppycur's Blood Moon Trickle Fix - Get Zombies all Night long -> KatanaSample - Every apocalypse needs a KatanaSample -> No Ammo Mod - Unload your weapons without disassembling -> Romero Mode - Head shots matter; aim well -> Zombie Transmogrifier - Zombies have random walk types - Zombies have random speed - Zombies have a small chance of running in the dark
